title: SDS Datathon
content: What kind of questions will they ask in the statistics datathon conducted for 6 marks as a part of our internals? Will it be difficult? Should we learn the content of all the hands on sessions conducted?

comments.body:
If it will be the same difficulty as last year then it will be easy, you will have to do standard data visualization and cleaning then some of the unit 2-3 things and the last part will be linear regression.


 If you have done the hands on session it will be pretty much easy since you can google for basic syntax. You just need to know the basics of the theory part.
Can non cs students take part ??
1:45 to 3:45 + 20 mins to make and upload a video explaining our work
Itâ€™s for internals to a CS course in 3rd sem

You'll find tons of resources online for the questions dw
(Barring ChatGPT of course). It's gonna be a ton of fun, i guarantee you that!
